summary: This memo discusses the coordination of Michael Weimer Stratton's operational use within the US by WH/4/Propaganda with Mr. McCORD of SRS. It addresses the implications of a CI operation within the US by the Agency and the possibility that Stratton might come to the attention of the FBI through association with Court WOOK. Mr. McCORD suggests not informing the FBI at this time but will review the case in a month.
title: STRATTON, Michael Weimer
